Tsumo.description: Self-drawing your winning tile with a closed hand.

AllSimples.description: A hand with no terminals or honors.

PureDoubleSequence.description: Two sequences of the same value and suit in a closed hand.

PrevalentWind.description: A triplet of the current round's Wind tile.

SeatWind.description: A triplet of the player's seat's Wind tile.

GreenDragon.description: A triplet of Green Dragon tiles.

RedDragon.description: A triplet of Red Dragon tiles.

WhiteDragon.description: A triplet of White Dragon tiles.

AfterKan.description: Drawing your winning tile from the dead wall after declaring a kan, or calling Ron on an opponent upgrading an open triplet into a kan.

LastTile.description: Drawing your winning tile as the last tile of the round, or calling Ron on the last discard of the round.

Dora.description: A special tile worth 1 han in hand. Indicated by Dora indicators.

AkaDora.description: A special red 5 tile worth 1 han in hand.

DoubleRiichi.description: When a player calls Riichi on their first turn, and before any tile calls.

TripleTriplets.description: Three sequences of the same value.

AllTriplets.description: A hand with four triplets or quads and a pair.

ThreeConcealedTriplets.description: A hand with three concealed triplets or quads. The hand itself may be open.

LittleThreeDragons.description: A hand with two Dragon triplets or quads and a Dragon pair.

AllTerminalsAndHonors.description: A hand made entirely of terminal and honor tiles.

SevenPairs.description: A hand made of seven pairs.

HalfOutsideHand.description: A hand with every set containing a terminal or honor.

PureStraight.description: Three sequences of values 1-2-3, 4-5-6, and 7-8-9 all of the same suit.

MixedTripleSequence.description: Three sequences of the same value.

TwicePureDoubleSequence.description: Two sequences of the same value and suit in a closed hand, twice.

FullyOutsideHand.description: A hand with every set containing a terminal.

HalfFlush.description: A hand with honors and all numbered tiles being of the same suit.

FullFlush.description: A hand of only numbered tiles of the same suit.

BlessedHand.description: Starting the game with a complete hand, or drawing a winning tile as your first draw, and before any tile calls.

BigThreeDragons.description: A hand with triplets or quads of all three Dragons.

FourLittleWinds.description: A hand with three triplets or quads of Winds, and a Wind pair.

FourConcealedTriplets.description: A hand with four concealed triplets.

AllHonors.description: A hand made entirely of honor tiles.

AllGreen.description: A hand made of entirely fully green tiles. Fully green tiles are 2, 3, 4, 6, and 8 of Sou, and the Green Dragon.

AllTerminals.description: A hand made entirely of terminal tiles.

ThirteenOrphans.description: A hand with one of every terminal and honor, of which one makes a pair.

NineGates.description: A hand made of three 1s, three 9s, and every simple numbered tile, all of the same suit.

SingleWaitFourConcealedTriplets.description: A hand with four concealed triplets, where the only wait is for the pair.

ThirteenWaitThirteenOrphans.description: A hand with one of every terminal and honor, of which one makes a pair, where the wait is any of the terminals or honors.

TrueNineGates.description: A hand made of three 1s, three 9s, and every simple numbered tile, all of the same suit, where the wait is any of the nine tiles of the suit.

FourBigWinds.description: A hand with triplets or quads of all four Winds.
